post_text:
𝐇𝐢𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐀𝐥𝐞𝐫𝐭 - 𝐒𝐞𝐧𝐢𝐨𝐫 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭 𝐌𝐚𝐧𝐚𝐠𝐞𝐫 @ 𝐇𝐲𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐛𝐚𝐝

As a  Senior Product Manager on the Project / Planner team, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the future of enterprise project management for our premium customers. Your mission will be to define and deliver high-value capabilities on our unified work management platform, ensuring it meets project management needs of enterprise-scale organizations. You will also identify opportunities to integrate AI in these capabilities to help enterprise users make smarter decisions, optimize resources, and drive outcomes.

If this sounds like something you are interested, we welcome your application and look forward to connecting!

Please apply here - https://lnkd.in/gBbcZrf5
